REBATE MANAGEMENT
Simplify Data Processing Engine Edits to Group and Aggregate Data

The Data Processing Engine Edits for Rebates prebuilt app helps you quickly map fields between Transaction Journal and Rebate Member Product Aggregate. Typically, you manually edit multiple nodes in a Data Processing Engine (DPE) definition to map similar fields on both objects. With this prebuilt app, you can use a point-and-click solution to map the group and aggregate fields for the Aggregate Payouts by Member with Aggregate Item Details definition. The app also helps you download the modified Data Processing Engine definition file. You can simply upload the modified file in the DPE builder to update the definition.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions that have Rebate Management enabled.
Simple Scenario-Based Data Processing Engine Edits for Rebates
Use the Data Processing Engine Edits for Rebates prebuilt app to easily group and aggregate Rebate Member Product Aggregate records. You don’t need to edit a Data Processing Engine (DPE) definition and modify multiple nodes to add custom grouping and aggregation logic.
Prerequisites for Using the Data Processing Engine Edits Prebuilt App
Review these prerequisites before you deploy and use the Data Processing Engine Edits prebuilt app.
Data Processing Engine Edits Prebuilt App Node Changes
Understand how the Data Processing Engine Edits for Rebates prebuilt app adds grouping and aggregation logic to a Data Processing Engine (DPE) definition.
Install the Data Processing Engine Edits Prebuilt App
Get easy access to the Data Processing Engine Edits for Rebates prebuilt app by directly installing a package in your org. You can also manually create a package in the learning org, add the app to the package, and then deploy the package in the target org. Unless you customize the prebuilt app in the learning org and want to deploy the customized version in your org, we recommend that you directly deploy the package in your org.
Work with the Data Processing Engine Edits Prebuilt App
Use the Data Processing Engine Edits for Rebates prebuilt app to easily edit Data Processing Engine (DPE) definitions. Map custom fields between Transaction Journal and Rebate Member Product Aggregate, and download the modified DPE JSON file for the Aggregate Payouts by Member with Aggregate Item Details definition. The grouping and aggregation logic is automatically updated in the DPE definition based on the field mappings. You can upload the JSON file in the DPE builder to view the changes to an existing DPE definition in your org.
Group and Aggregate Records Using the Data Processing Engine Edit App (Example)
This example shows how a company uses the Simple Scenario-Based Data Processing Engine Edits for Rebates prebuilt app to group and aggregate Rebate Member Product Aggregate records.
